meanings.definition: The act of settling in a new place.
meanings.sent1: The resettlements of families after the flood were heartwarming.
meanings.sent2: The government organized the resettlements of refugees to ensure their safety.
meanings.sent3: The resettlements of the ants from the kitchen to the garden made the picnic interesting.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like a resettlements, finding peace in a new relationship.
meanings.sent5: The resettlements of the birds in the tree created a beautiful sight.

meanings.definition: The process of moving people to a new location.
meanings.sent1: The resettlements of the students to the new school were smooth.
meanings.sent2: The resettlements of the villagers to higher ground prevented flooding casualties.
meanings.sent3: The resettlements of the toys from the bedroom to the living room amused the children.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a resettlements, constantly shifting thoughts to new perspectives.
meanings.sent5: The resettlements of the clouds across the sky painted a stunning sunset.

meanings.definition: A community established in a new area.
